summary: ClearForm Admin, Pricing, and Navigation features testing complete. All 10 backend tests passed. Frontend pages working correctly after fixing import path issues in AdminClearFormUsersPage.jsx and AdminClearFormDocumentsPage.jsx.

minor.issue: Backend API returns different pricing (10=£9.99, 25=£19.99) than what's displayed on pricing page (10=£5, 25=£10, 75=£25). Frontend has hardcoded values that don't match backend.

action_items: Consider syncing pricing page credit package prices with backend API values, or update backend to match frontend display prices
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed import paths in AdminClearFormUsersPage.jsx and AdminClearFormDocumentsPage.jsx - they were using ../../ instead of ../ for imports
context_for_next_testing_agent: ClearForm admin section is fully functional in Unified Admin Console. Admin endpoints at /api/admin/clearform/* all working. Pricing page has CVP and ClearForm tabs working correctly. ClearForm Vault and Credits pages accessible after login. Note: Backend credit package prices differ from frontend display prices (frontend has hardcoded values).

pricing_page.cvp_tab: PASS - Shows CVP plans (Solo Landlord, Portfolio, Professional)
pricing_page.clearform_tab: PASS - Shows credit top-ups and subscription plans
pricing_page.subscription_plans_display: PASS - Shows Free, Personal £9.99, Power User £24.99

clearform_vault_page.page_loads: PASS - Document Vault page loads correctly
clearform_vault_page.document_list: PASS - Shows user's documents with status
clearform_vault_page.search_filter: PASS - Search and filter controls present

admin_clearform_section.sidebar_nav: PASS - ClearForm section visible in admin sidebar
admin_clearform_section.users_page: PASS - Shows all ClearForm users with stats
admin_clearform_section.documents_page: PASS - Shows all ClearForm documents with status

admin_api_endpoints.users: PASS - GET /api/admin/clearform/users returns paginated user list
admin_api_endpoints.documents: PASS - GET /api/admin/clearform/documents returns paginated doc list
admin_api_endpoints.auth_required: PASS - All endpoints require admin authentication

import_path_fix_applied.issue: Import paths used ../../ instead of ../ causing webpack compilation errors
import_path_fix_applied.resolution: Changed all imports from ../../components/* to ../components/* and ../../api/* to ../api/*
